summary: Provides FastAPI routes that manage the single signâ€‘on (SSO) workflow for the LiteLLM admin UI, handling login initiation, callback processing, JWT generation, and redirection to the UI, along with helper utilities for UI settings and user creation.
business_intent: Integrate external authentication providers into the LiteLLM management interface, allowing users to sign in via SSO, receive secure JWT tokens, and access the admin UI with appropriate permissions.
